mapper.sql: T1.id,T1.task_id AS taskId,T1.item_id AS itemId,T1.sku_id AS skuId,T1.upc AS upc,T1.sku_code AS skuCode,T1.task_price AS taskPrice,T1.task_max_price AS taskMaxPrice,T1.`count` AS count,T1.`status`,T1.task_start_time AS taskStartTime,T1.task_end_time AS taskEndTime,T1.gmt_create AS gmtCreate,T1.gmt_modify AS gmtModify,T1.`mode`,T1.currency,T1.task_order_no AS taskOrderNo,T1.remark,T1.task_max_count AS taskMaxCount, T1.buyer_id as buyerId,T1.buyer_name as buyerName,T1.owner_id as ownerId,T1.owner_name as ownerName,T1.in_count as inCount
mapper.select:
SELECT ,T2.item_name as itemName ,T2.sku_code as skuCode, T2.color as color,T2.scale as scale,T2.buy_site as buySite,T2.sku_pic as skuPic,T1.`count` AS taskDailyCount,T1.id As taskDailyDetailId, T2.cost_price as costPrice,T2.discount,T2.purchase_price as purchasePrice, case T2.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM task_daily_detail T1 left join item_sku T2 on T1.sku_id=T2.id where 1=1
and T1.buyer_id = #{buyerId}
and T2.item_name LIKE concat('%',#{itemName},'%')
and T2.buy_site LIKE concat('%',#{buySite},'%')
and T1.task_start_time<=NOW() and T1.task_end_time>= NOW() and T1.status=0 order by IFNULL(T2.buy_site, ''),trim(T2.item_name),T2.color,(T2.scale+0),scale_int

SELECT b.item_name as itemName,b.sku_pic as skuPic,b.sku_code as skuCode,b.upc,b.brand,b.color,b.scale,b.buy_site as buySite,a.count,c.task_title as taskTitle,c.gmt_create as gmtCreate,c.task_order_no as taskOrderNo,in_count as inCount, case b.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM task_daily_detail a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_id=b.id LEFT JOIN task_daily c ON a.task_id=c.id WHERE a.task_id=#{taskId} ORDER BY IFNULL(b.buy_site, ''),trim(b.item_name),b.color,(b.scale+0),scale_int

SELECT ,T2.sku_pic as skuPic,T2.color as color, T2.scale as scaleInt FROM task_daily_detail T1 LEFT JOIN item_sku T2 ON T1.sku_id=T2.id WHERE T1.task_id=#{taskId} ORDER BY IFNULL(T2.buy_site, ''),trim(T2.item_name),T2.color,(T2.scale+0),scaleInt
SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(T1.count,0)),0) FROM task_daily_detail T1 WHERE T1.status = 0
SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) FROM task_daily_detail T1 WHERE T1.status = 1 AND T1.in_count != count
mapper.update: UPDATE task_daily_detail SET upc=#{upc} WHERE (upc!=#{upc} or upc is null) and sku_id=#{skuId};
